title: I FOUND where Riot went wrong! The exact point in history!
body:
V1.0.0.152:
Lee sin
Stats
Base movement speed increased to 350 from 325


Here you see possibly one of the biggest buffs to come onto league. And to whom? Lee sin. This was the point where riot was like 'okay, this champion will be op as fuck'

replies.body:
Erm...

Every single champion got the +25 ms in that patch. It was when boots got changed to have a bit less ms so that they aren't a must-buy at level 1.
This guy is either trolling REALLY hard or he's really stupid.
Lee sin only has a 45% win rate.
So you and me wil take a time machine and undo what have been done ?
And yet lee sin isn't even that op...
